item.title: Wish You Were Here永不过时啊
item.description: 其实我一直不是非常喜欢Pink Floyd的其他歌曲，PF的歌也真不合我的风格，我平常听的是红辣椒这种风格的乐队（强推californication这一专辑），除了Wish You Were Here，这首我一直听了好几年。我喜欢听的歌曲经常听了几个月就不喜欢了，果然太喜新厌旧了。但这首真听不厌，难以想象是上世纪70年代的歌曲。 附歌词与音乐链接： 歌词： So, so you think you can tell Heaven from Hell Blue skies from pain Can you tell a green field from a cold steel rail? A smile from a veil? Do you think you can tell? And did they get you to trade， your heroes for ghosts? Hot ashes for trees? Hot air for a cool breeze? Cold comfort for change? And did you exchange，
